content.en: Smart irrigation: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms and IoT technology to optimize water usage in agriculture. These algorithms, based on machine learning and artificial intelligence, analyze data from sensors and weather forecasts to predict irrigation requirements. By automating irrigation decisions, these smart systems aim to improve water-resource utilization, increase crop yield, and conserve water in precision farming.
content.da: Smart vanding: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer og IoT-teknologi for at optimere vandforbruget i landbruget. Disse algoritmer, baseret på maskinlæring og kunstig intelligens, analyserer data fra sensorer og vejrudsigter for at forudsige vandingsbehov. Ved at automatisere vandingsbeslutninger sigter disse smarte systemer mod at forbedre vandressourceudnyttelsen, øge udbyttet af afgrøder og spare vand i præcisionslandbrug.
